text: William James Gaither (born March 28, 1936) is an American gospel singer- songwriter. He is known for his works with his wife Gloria. He is also known for performing as part of the Bill Gaither Trio and the Gaither Vocal Band (GVB). ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American gospel singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American record producers Category:Singers from Indiana Category:Musicians from Indiana Category:Businesspeople from Indiana
title: Bill Gaither (gospel singer)
